description:
After a day of just hanging and goofing around, Johnny Hill decides to spend the night instead of make the long drive home. Carter Woods has no problem with that- Johnny has stayed over many times- but tonight when Carter makes sure he has blankets and is comfortable, Johnny makes a move on Carter. Carter never knew Johnny was like that, but now that it's out in the open, and Johnny is waiting for Carter's response, the ball is in his court, and what Carter decides to do next could change their friendship forever.

Enjoy!
title: Cornered Cocks
